name: Nightlife Noir issues 1&2
blurb: Nightlife Noir is a an anthology of six short stories from six different artists, centered around New York City's sceney underbelly.

name: Supercats Mewow!
blurb: A wonderfully whimsical way to introduce children to reading and comics with lovable superhero cats! A Kickstarter Exclusive Book!!

name: The Book of Barb
blurb: A completely cool collection of barbarian webcomic adventures.

name: HAUNTHOLOGY: A Horror Comic Collection by Jeremy Haun
blurb: An oversized, 160+ page, hardcover of original short horror comics.

name: Max Boost Omnibus- Collection of classic & BRAND NEW issues!
blurb: Huge 275 Page collectible book contains all comics of Max Boost Volume 1, Volume 2, and BRAND NEW issues from Volume 3.1!

name: Baby Barbarian - a fantasy comic about family for all ages.
blurb: Accidents happen when you sit on the Player's Throne! Support Part One of our comic about magic, adventure, and inherited raging.

name: Winona Forever: Part Two in a graphic novel series
blurb: Four 8th grade nerds, a powerful hidden relic & a dangerous secret society. It's a Halloween like no other in normally quiet Winona, MN

name: BLACK VANS: LGBT/queer/POC cyberpunk super-hero comic
blurb: A Sci-Fi/Cyberpunk Super-hero comic with queer POC leads

name: Angry Squad: Viva Las Angry
blurb: Angry Fred and his team set out to stop a deluded soldier from wreaking havoc across Las Vegas.

name: NINJA BEAR #1-3: The Master's Journey
blurb: A new comic adventure plus NINJA BEAR Action-Plush 2.0 (now with more action and more plush!)

name: Eule's Vision Issue 4
blurb: Join us for the 4th installment of Eule's Vision! A comic brought to you by Jacob Stem, Chad Heinrich and Monica Castillo.

name: Midnight Highway #1-2: an 80's-inspired sci-fi/horror comic
blurb: The second issue in the "Alice in Wonderland meets Twilight Zone" trip through the supernatural takes place in a haunted arcade.
